caseStudies.title: Nesto
caseStudies.description: We developed a digital mortgage platform for Nesto that streamlines the entire process with real-time rate comparisons, application tracking, and personalised guidance.
caseStudies.results: Streamlined mortgage process, real-time rate comparisons

caseStudies.title: PostScrypt Phase 1
caseStudies.description: PostScrypt is a secure digital platform that allows users to create, store, and manage their wills online.

caseStudies.title: PostScrypt Phase 2
caseStudies.description: Our platform offers three smart ways to capture personal memories: AI-powered chats saved as a digital archive, online meetings where the bot attends and generates a booklet, and recorded or uploaded interviews that are automatically converted into a structured digital booklet.

caseStudies.title: Educity College Website
caseStudies.description: A responsive college website showcasing Educity’s programs, campus life, testimonials, and contact details, built using HTML5, CSS3, and React JS.

caseStudies.title: MapView Extension for Zoho Crm
caseStudies.description: MapView gives you a bird’s-eye view of your CRM data by displaying Leads, Contacts, Accounts, Vendors, Deals, and Custom Modules on Google Maps. With bubble and heat maps, customizable address fields, and detailed field mapping, you can quickly analyze trends, view related info, and manage records by location—all in one unified map view.

caseStudies.title: Leadfinder Extension for Zoho Crm
caseStudies.description: LeadFinder is a Zoho CRM extension that discovers new leads using keyword, location, and radius-based search. Powered by Google Places, it provides real-time business data, extracts emails from websites, shows results on maps or list views, and lets users instantly import leads into any CRM module.

caseStudies.title: LinkedPro Extension for Zoho Crm
caseStudies.description: LinkedPro lets you import LinkedIn connections or target profiles directly into Zoho CRM. Use advanced search and filters to find people by name, job, company, domain, or location, view detailed profiles, export to CSV, and sync selected contacts into your CRM with ease.

caseStudies.title: InboxWidget
caseStudies.description: InboxWidget unifies Gmail, Outlook, Zoho, and other accounts into one workspace. It streamlines email management with smart tags, filters, thread association, and team assignments, letting you send, receive, organize, and collaborate without switching tabs.
